snippet: A bill to limit unfair detentions and make communities safer deserves Gov. Jerry Brown’s signature.
abstract: Editorial urges California Gov Jerry Brown to sign the Trust Act, a recently passed state bill that prevents local police departments from turning their jails into immigration holding cells for noncriminals or minor offenders whose sentences are up or who should otherwise be out on bail; contends that the bill offers a sensible approach to limit unfair detentions and help conserve local resources for fighting crime.
lead_paragraph: A bill to limit unfair detentions and make communities safer deserves Gov. Jerry Brown’s signature.
